fno: In the cash market, the Nifty 50 lost 99.75 points or 0.51% to settle at 19,365.25. The NSE's India VIX, a gauge of market's expectation of volatility over the near term, rose 0.94% to 12.24. Reliance Industries (RIL), HDFC Bank, ICICI Bank were the top traded individual stock futures contracts in F&O segment of NSE. The August 2023 F&O contracts will expire on 31 August 2023.
